name: Poison Gas Projector, Disposable (DPPj-12)
description: Disposable version of the poison gas projector. The poison gas projector projects a cloud of poisonous gas at the target. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
